memories.content: Extraction API sync/async fix completed (2026-01-06). Added get_sync_db() to db/session.py, updated 6 extraction endpoints. O(n²) → O(1) cell lookup optimization implemented with sheet caching. Performance: 1.04s for 14MB file, 99.5% cache hit rate.

Security: config.py uses env vars only (no hardcoded secrets). Token blacklist implemented in app/core/token_blacklist.py with Redis primary + in-memory fallback. JWTs include jti for blacklist support. CORS configured for localhost dev + brcapital.com production domains.

Tests: 1004 passed, 16 skipped. Deployment readiness: ~70%. Main blockers: complete deploy.yml placeholders, create docker-compose.yml. Key files: backend/app/extraction/extractor.py (cell caching), backend/app/api/v1/endpoints/extraction.py (18 endpoints), backend/app/core/config.py (env-based config).

Priority: 1) Complete deploy.yml placeholder scripts, 2) Create docker-compose.yml for local dev, 3) Add tests for 7 monitor endpoints, 4) Split extraction.py (1154 lines) into smaller files, 5) Create test_crud/test_extraction.py and test_services/test_file_monitor.py.

SharePoint extraction uses memory-keeper for checkpoints (namespace: dashboard-project). Extraction scheduler at EXTRACTION_SCHEDULE_CRON (default 2 AM). File filter: .*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.* pattern, excludes ~$,.tmp,backup,vOld. Reference file: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx with 1169 cell mappings.
